column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This place is conceptually cool. 4 seating options: bar
column4: and ramen bar. We did the shared long table which was quite nice. The lychee Moscow mule was wonderful. We got fried Brussel sprouts which was heavenly! I got the wonton chicken ramen which was alright; I'm not the biggest soup fan BUT the flavor profile was nice and then wontons were great. I will definitely be back!
